item.description:
The Nieman Conference on Narrative Journalism is the premier annual event for narrative journalists eager to enhance their powers of observation and inquiry, sharpen their reporting and analytical skills, and write with literary flair.

This year's conference, Storytelling in Many Voices, Many Media, promises to be better than ever with new sessions on multimedia storytelling. Reflecting the many formats in which we tell true stories today, our traditional all-star cast of writers and editors working in print, film, broadcasting, and publishing will be complemented by bloggers, podcasters, and other multimedia pioneers.

More information to follow... look for conference details and registration information in your inbox in mid-November.

Link
item.how_to_find_us: This is not a CMF event; FYI only. S.
item.name: Nieman Conference on Narrative Journalism
